posts.post_content:
Hey guys

First timer for T206 / vintage card collecting in general-Found my childhood set of junk wax and reminded myself of how awesome baseball cards are. I’m captivated by the great artwork and coloring of the T206 and the idea of owning something with more stories than I can think of excites me. Wanting to dive into a few raw or low graded commons- Anyone have any they are looking to sell or have advice to a young collector? Been researching the series, watching ebay etc to get a feel for what to look for, but looking for a place to start. 

Thanks!

I just joined the site here today. I'm looking to start a T206 collection. I'm being realistic as to the collection I can attain. I'd love to have an opportunity to get started with some commons or lower grade cards. Any information would be appreciated. Thanks.

Sending you a pm


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

As a follow up- thanks to everyone who reached out! This community has been super engaging and helpful. Shout out to Eliot and 53ToppsCollector for helping me get my first couple of cards. Can’t wait to share them with my boys when they are older! 

Still interested in getting a couple more raw or low grade commons, or any advice you have had collecting T206. I know there is a tremendous wealth of knowledge and experience in this group!
BUMP - still looking for raw commons

This community has been awesome. Both folks I have gotten cards with have been super helpful and even got an extra common out of it! Thanks for getting me excited about T206. Up to a mighty 6 total! It’s fun thinking about the long term growth though of my collection and passing it down to my sons one day.

I still have a modest $38 left in my budget for the year. Anyone have any commons they are looking to sell? Let me know, thanks!
